overview: Leo is smitten with the new hire in his company, but the new hire, April, only follows the “love” advice from her psychic, Madam Lazora. Faced with this problem, Leo bribes the Madam Lazora to tell April that he’s "the one." April “sees” Leo (the double lion) in a new light, and they get to know each other. Except she’s into him too much to the point where she's driving him crazy.
title: Chakra Love
